column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bully guard says : " I am not !
#Text=" Warden says : " Save your breath !
#Text=I know you were working together .
#Text=You threw Chit Sang in the very cooler they used to escape .
#Text=It was all part of your plan .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " That was just a coincidence !
#Text=" Bodyguard # 2 says : " Sir , there 's someone to see you .
#Text=" Warden says : " Who told you to interrupt me ?
#Text=" Azula says : " I did .
#Text=" Warden says : " Princess Azula .
#Text=Ah ... It is an honor to welcome you to the Fire Nation 's most exemplary prison .
#Text=I did n't realize you were coming .
#Text=" Azula says : " Who is this ?
#Text=" Warden says : " He 's a guard who was involved in a recent and feeble escape attempt .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " It was n't me !
#Text=" Warden says : " Quiet , you !
#Text=" Azula says : " You 're wasting your time .
#Text=That 's not one of them .
#Text=" Warden says : " How do you know ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Because I 'm a people person .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , I just got orders .
#Text=Let the prisoners out into the yard .
#Text=" Door guard says : " But we 're in the middle of a lockdown .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , okay , I 'll just go tell the warden you said that .
#Text=I 'm sure he 'll be glad to hear about you undermining his authority .
#Text=What 's your name again ?
#Text=" Door guard says : " Wait !
#Text=Do n't tell the warden .
#Text=I 'm just a little confused .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , I 'm confused too , but the warden 's in a bad mood , and ... irrational , so if you ask me , it 's best not to question it , and just do what he says .
#Text=" Door guard says : " Yeah ... you 're right .
#Text=We 're letting them out !
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is it !
#Text=We have to start a riot .
#Text=" Suki says : " Okay .
#Text=But how do we do that ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " I 'll show you .
#Text=" Tough prisoner says : " Hey !
#Text=What 'd you do that for ?
#Text=That hurt my feelings .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Are n't you mad at me ?
#Text=" Tough prisoner says : " Uh , well , normally I would be , but I 've been learning to control my anger .
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is n't working .
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Hey you !
#Text=You 're lucky I did n't rat you out , but my generosity comes with a price .
#Text=I know you 're planning another escape attempt , and I want in .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Actually , we 're trying to escape right now , but we need a riot .
#Text=You would n't happen to know how to start one , would you ?
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " A prison riot ?
#Text=Please .
#Text=Hey !
#Text=Riot !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Impressive .
#Text=" Tough prisoner says : " Forget about controlling my anger ... let 's riot !
#Text=" Warden says : " Who let these prisoners into the yard ?
#Text=This is supposed to be a lockdown !
#Text=" Male guard # 2 says : " Ma'am , there 's a riot going on !
#Text=I 'm here to protect you !
#Text=" Mai says : " I do n't need any protection .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Believe me , she does n't .
#Text=" Male guard # 2 says : " I 'm sorry , but I 'm under direct orders from your uncle to make sure nothing happens .
#Text=" Mai says : " Get off of me !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Zuko !
#Text=Good , we 're all here .
#Text=Now all we need to do is grab the warden , and get to the gondolas !
#Text=" Zuko says : " And how do we do that ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm not sure .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I thought you thought this through !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I thought you told me it 's okay not to think everything through !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Maybe not everything , but this is kind of important !
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Hey , uh , fellas .
#Text=I think your girlfriend 's taking care of it .
#Text=" Warden says : " You would n't dare .
#Text=" Suki says : " Sorry , warden .
#Text=You 're my prisoner now .
#Text=We 've got the warden !
#Text=Now let 's get out of here !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " That 's some girl .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Tell me about it .
#Text="
